Weightless Kite Shield

shield (lvl 2)

item id [id]: 150
armor id [armor]: 66 (Weightless Kite Shield)
protection, shield [protshield]: 21
parry [parry]: 7

Requires 10A to forge (A2)

This kite shield is enchanted with Air magic, making it light and quick. Kite shields are usually used by mounted troops.
